paragraph: Thomas T. Moulton (January 1, 1896 â€“ March 29, 1967) was an American sound engineer. He won five Academy Awards in the category Sound Recording and was nominated for eleven more in the same category. He was also nominated four times in the category Best Visual Effects.
Moulton won five Academy Awards for Best Sound, was nominated for eleven more in the same category and four more for Best Visual Effects:
All About Eve (1950)Nominated (Best Sound)The Affairs of Cellini (1934)
With a Song in My Heart (1952)Nominated (Best Visual Effects)Foreign Correspondent (1940)
